welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gothenburg, a charming city known for its stunning canals, delicious seafood, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer!

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Landvetter Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Landvetter Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic re-connection.
